input_email_body:
Subject: Security Vulnerability in Medical IT System

A security vulnerability in the medical IT system of the hospital has been identified, resulting in the breach of medical data You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. This is due to outdated software and weak access controls. Firewalls are in place and security protocols have been updated, yet vulnerabilities persist. My name is Maria Gonzalez.
